Class CatalogQueryTool

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, Interruptable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NavigatorQueryTool, SkycatCatalogQueryTool
public class CatalogQueryTool
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, Interruptable

Displays a CatalogQueryPanel in a JScrollPane and implements a search() method.

See Also:
